Key Match Events: Jusuf Nurkic made the second of two free throws with 0.8 seconds left after getting fouled on an offensive rebound, lifting the Phoenix Suns to a 114-113 victory over the Dallas Mavericks
Miscellaneous Highlights: Phoenix Suns improved to 8-1 for the first time since 2009-10
Two of the victories have been over defending Western Conference champion Dallas
Others: Royce O'Neale was a big boost off the bench, with Phoenix reserves outscoring the Dallas bench 28-9
Kyrie Irving scored 29 points, and Naji Marshall had 18 for Dallas
